================================================================
Document Header
Copy and paste this tag in the <head> section of your HTML.
================================================================
<script>
    var adsmtag = adsmtag || {};
    adsmtag.cmd = adsmtag.cmd || [];
    (function () {
        var script = document.createElement('script');
        script.async = true;
        script.type = 'text/javascript';
        script.src = 'https:' + '//rmb-adsembler.netdna-ssl.com/mnemonics/adsm.macro.7efebe16-6344-493c-a6c4-4dbdab26d84f.js';
        var node = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
        node.parentNode.insertBefore(script, node);
    })();
</script>

================================================================
Document Body
Copy and paste these tags in the <body> section of your HTML.
Place each tag in the desired location of the associated <div>.
================================================================
<div id="cncpt-rp-lb1"></div>

<div id="cncpt-rp-sky1"></div>

<div id="cncpt-rp-sky2"></div>

<div id="cncpt-rp-rec1"></div>

<div id="cncpt-rp-rec2"></div>

<div id="cncpt-rp-rec3"></div>

<div id="cncpt-rp-mob1"></div>

<div id="cncpt-rp-mob2"></div>

<div id="cncpt-rp-mob3"></div>

<div id="cncpt-rp-outstream"></div>

<div id="cncpt-herognu-lb1"></div>

<div id="cncpt-herognu-sky1"></div>

<div id="cncpt-herognu-sky2"></div>

<div id="cncpt-herognu-rec1"></div>

<div id="cncpt-herognu-rec2"></div>

<div id="cncpt-herognu-rec3"></div>

<div id="cncpt-herognu-mob1"></div>

<div id="cncpt-herognu-mob2"></div>

<div id="cncpt-herognu-mob3"></div>

<div id="cncpt-herognu-outstream"></div>
